game.name: Empress Creator HTML5
game.description:
Do you want to create a regal character that has a rich experience of ruling over her lands?  If yes, we have got you covered with a brand new girls game where you have something new to try to kill your time. Would you like to play it right away? Join Empress Creator HTML5 and be prepared to dress up your character with the royal outfits!  Hey girls! Make sure to make the needful changes to the background. Save your creation in the end to see whether she will be an evil or fair ruler!

You can make the changes in her nose, eyes, eyebrows and lips and skin tone. Find out plenty of outfit choices for the upper and bottom part of her body. You can also spot number of options for the jacket, shrug and hand gloves. Make sure to adorn your character with the matching crown. Feel free to change the background of the game to make it more interesting and look fabulous! You can hide and unhide menu anytime you want by clicking the option shown on the top right corner of the screen. 

Prepare your character and background with the help of multiple colors shown on the right side of the screen in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls! Put your creativity to the best to prepare your own hero character! Give your favorite hairstyle and give it the colors you want! The multiple fancy dresses including a simpler kimono or bulky skirts will be enough to keep you glued to the screen for long. Select a crown that clears what position she holds now, including animal horns, classical diamond and others! Do your best to this new perfect leader a new life!
